headline: AI Transforming the Machinery Industry Through Manufacturing Execution Systems (MES)
summary: Delray Beach, FL, Oct. 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Artificial Intelligence (AI) has become a defining force in the machinery and manufacturing sectors, reshaping how production systems are managed, optimized, and scaled. Among all digital transformation tools, the Manufacturing Execution System (MES) stands out as the central nervous system of modern manufacturing operations. headline: Rockwell Automation Increases Quarterly Dividend to $1.38 Per Share on Common Stock
summary: MILWAUKEE, October 30, 2025--The Board of Directors of Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK), following its regular review, today declared a quarterly dividend of $1.38 per share on its outstanding common stock, payable Dec. 10, 2025, to shareowners of record at the close of business on Nov. 17, 2025. This increase from last quarter’s dividend of $1.31 reflects a continued strong financial position and reinforces the company’s commitment to returning profits to shareowners.

headline: Rockwell Automation (ROK) Reports Next Week: Wall Street Expects Earnings Growth
summary: Rockwell Automation (ROK) possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.

headline: First Autonomous Mobile Robots Roll Off the Line at Rockwell Automation’s Milwaukee Headquarters
summary: MILWAUKEE, October 30, 2025--Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK), the world’s largest company dedicated to industrial automation and digital transformation, today announced the first autonomous mobile robots (AMRs) have officially rolled off the production line at its global headquarters in Milwaukee.
